name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D Live】 戌神ころね6th記念★☆ 3D＆パペットライブ！？ 【#戌神ころね6周年】 [ASwjM25ax58]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Korone and the guest Gorgeous start the segment with high energy and a signature gag using a globe.
Gorgeous removes his pet parrot puppet, Angelina, and they joke about their resemblance.
They discuss how it's their first time meeting and compare their years of experience in entertainment.
Gorgeous performs his full, high-energy signature self-introduction for the audience.
Gorgeous explains his 'Space Pirate' persona versus his real-life residence in Meguro.
Korone introduces the anniversary hashtag and Gorgeous tries to turn it into a gag.
Gorgeous comments on Korone's puppet appearance being different from her usual 3D model.
They talk about Gorgeous's childhood in Fukushima and their mutual dislike of bugs as adults.
Gorgeous tells a fictional story about how he got the star mark on his eye and became a Space Pirate.

subtitles.original: イエーーーイ！！
subtitles.english: Yay!!!

subtitles.original: いいえ！いいスタートが切れたんじゃないの？
subtitles.english: No! Wasn't that a great start?

subtitles.original: 本当だよ、そうだよね、本当に。ねえ、うん。
subtitles.english: That's true, it really was, honestly. Right? Yeah.

subtitles.original: いいスタートが切れたんじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Wasn't that a great start?

subtitles.original: いいスタート、いいスタート、いいスタート、それ！
subtitles.english: Good start, good start, good start, there!

subtitles.original: ぼーっとしてた。ここ、いいスタート、いやぁ！
subtitles.english: I was spaced out. Here, a good start, yeah!

subtitles.original: すごいすごい、初めて見た！
subtitles.english: Wow, wow, first time seeing that!

subtitles.original: ぼーっとしてたよ！さっきも見たさっきも見た。
subtitles.english: I was spaced out! I saw it just now too.

subtitles.original: いやぁ、いい曲聴いたらぼーっとしてたよ、本当にね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, listening to a good song made me space out, really.

subtitles.original: ありがとうね。
subtitles.english: Thanks.

subtitles.original: いいよ、全然いいよ、うん。
subtitles.english: It's okay, totally fine, yeah.

subtitles.original: 結局外すね。これ外す...
subtitles.english: I'll take it off in the end. Taking this off...

subtitles.original: これ外す。ああ、それ偽物なの？それ。
subtitles.english: Taking this off. Ah, is that a fake?

subtitles.original: 偽物じゃない、これアンジェリーナ。
subtitles.english: It's not a fake, this is Angelina.

subtitles.original: あ、可愛いね。ちょっと似てるな、何かここ。
subtitles.english: Oh, how cute. It looks a bit like you.

subtitles.original: 似てないよ、世界観が似てない似てない。
subtitles.english: It doesn't. The world views don't match at all.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、ということで、ころちゃん！
subtitles.english: No no no, anyway, Koro-chan!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 初めましてだね、これね。
subtitles.english: This is our first time meeting, right?

subtitles.original: 初めましてだよ、ゴー☆ジャスさんは。
subtitles.english: It is our first time! Gorgeous-san is...

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと...え？ちょっと水臭いな。ゴー☆ジャスでいいよ。
subtitles.english: Wait... eh? That's a bit distant. Just Gorgeous is fine.

subtitles.original: え、ゴー☆ジャスでいいの？
subtitles.english: Eh, just Gorgeous is fine?

subtitles.original: いい全然。お前らはゴー☆ジャスさんってつけろよ！
subtitles.english: It's fine. You guys better call me Gorgeous-san!

subtitles.original: あ、ころだけ特別ね。
subtitles.english: Ah, so only Korone is special.

subtitles.original: あ、じゃあゴー☆ジャスはさ、芸歴何年なの？
subtitles.english: So Gorgeous, how many years have you been in show business?

subtitles.original: 芸歴ね、恥ずかしいんだけどね、25年やってるね。
subtitles.english: My career length, it's a bit embarrassing, but I've been doing it for 25 years.

subtitles.original: 大先輩やないかい！
subtitles.english: You're a huge senior!

subtitles.original: でもずっと売れてないから全然...まだ若手で換算してほしい。
subtitles.english: But I haven't been popular all this time, so... I want you to still count me as a newcomer.

subtitles.original: 売れてるよ！
subtitles.english: You're popular!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ころと一緒ってことでいい？
subtitles.english: Then, can we say you're the same as Korone?

subtitles.original: そう？ころちゃんも若手？
subtitles.english: Really? Is Koro-chan a newcomer too?

subtitles.original: ころ6年目だね。
subtitles.english: Korone is in her 6th year.

subtitles.original: 6年目...あ、尊いぐらいだね。
subtitles.english: 6th year... oh, that's about precious.

subtitles.original: まだ中堅かな？
subtitles.english: Still a mid-career, maybe?

subtitles.original: まだ中堅...いや、じゃあ同じぐらいだね。このVTuber界とお笑い界みたいな感じだね。
subtitles.english: Still mid-career... well then it's about the same level in the VTuber world and comedy world.

subtitles.original: ということでございまして...ちょっとそうだ。僕のことやっぱり知らない人いるから、一回本気の自己紹介やっちゃっていい？
subtitles.english: And so... wait. There are people who don't know me, so can I do my serious self-introduction once?

subtitles.original: あ、そうだね。いいよ。
subtitles.english: Oh, right. Go ahead.

subtitles.original: 一回いきますよ。じゃあいきますよいきますよいきますよ。
subtitles.english: Here I go once. Alright, here I go, here I go, here I go.

subtitles.original: ワン、ツー！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: 君のハートに、レボ☆リューション！宇宙海賊のゴー☆ジャスです、よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Revolution in your heart! I'm the Space Pirate Gorgeous, nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 宇宙海賊なんですよ、そうなんですよ。
subtitles.english: I'm a Space Pirate, that's right.

subtitles.original: あ、そうなの？じゃあ宇宙に住んでるってこと？
subtitles.english: Oh, really? So you live in space?

subtitles.original: いや目黒区に住んでるけどね。
subtitles.english: No, I live in Meguro ward though.

subtitles.original: 目黒区なんだ、言っていいのそれ？
subtitles.english: You live in Meguro ward? Is it okay to say that?

subtitles.original: もういい全然、うん。ちゃんと住民票出してるから。
subtitles.english: It's fine, totally. I've properly filed my residency certificate.

subtitles.original: じゃあ芸歴24年の...25年。25年の目黒区の芸人さんね。
subtitles.english: So a comedian from Meguro ward with 25 years of career.

subtitles.original: まとめないでよ！それぐらいの人も結局目黒区住んでるからね、同じようなね。
subtitles.english: Don't summarize it like that! People at that level end up living in Meguro anyway.

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Ah, wait a minute.

subtitles.original: えっとね、今日ハッシュタグがあってね、犬神ころね6周年ってつけて、みんな呟いてね。
subtitles.english: Um, there's a hashtag today. Everyone, please tweet using #InugamiKorone6thAnniversary.

subtitles.original: お！これ？出てるよそこね、ここ！ハッシュタグ！
subtitles.english: Oh! This? It's showing up there, right here! Hashtag!

subtitles.original: ハッシュタグ、ハッシュタグ、それ！ここ！ハッシュタグ！
subtitles.english: Hashtag, hashtag, there! Here! Hashtag!

subtitles.original: じゃないんだね、その何か国名みたいな...ハッシュタグはないんだ。
subtitles.english: It's not that, like your country name gag... There's no hashtag version.

subtitles.original: ないよ、ハッシュタグはダメだよ、そこぼやかしちゃうとハッシュタグみんな呟いてくれなくなっちゃうからね。
subtitles.english: There isn't. You can't mess with the hashtag or people won't use it.

subtitles.original: ないのもあるんだ、できないのもあるんだね。
subtitles.english: So there are some things you don't have, things you can't do.

subtitles.original: ないときはないからね。しょうがないよね。ということでね。
subtitles.english: When I don't have it, I don't. It can't be helped. Anyway...

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、何かちょっと二人の距離を縮めたい何かね。
subtitles.english: I kind of want to close the distance between us somehow.

subtitles.original: あ、何か縮めちゃう？
subtitles.english: Oh, should we close it?

subtitles.original: うん。何かでもさ、何か今更だけどさ、いつも見てるころちゃんと違う雰囲気なんだけどこれ。
subtitles.english: Yeah. But also, it's a bit late to say, but you have a different vibe from the Korone-chan I usually see.

subtitles.original: いつもの見た目知ってるの？
subtitles.english: Do you know my usual appearance?

subtitles.original: 知ってるよちゃんと！見てきたよちゃんと事前に。
subtitles.english: I know it properly! I checked it out beforehand.

subtitles.original: 嘘！あんまり変わらないよでも。
subtitles.english: Liar! But I don't look that different.

subtitles.original: 変わらないのこれ？変わらないとは変わらないけどね。
subtitles.english: You don't? Well, it's not that different, but...

subtitles.original: ちょっと小さくなったぐらいだよね。
subtitles.english: ...you've just become a bit smaller, right?

subtitles.original: ちょっと小さくなったぐらいだよね。
subtitles.english: Just a bit smaller, right.

subtitles.original: 現寸がちょっと分からないですけどもね。
subtitles.english: I don't know your actual size though.

subtitles.original: まあ小さいといえばさ、ゴー☆ジャスはさ、どんな子供だったの？
subtitles.english: Speaking of small, Gorgeous, what kind of child were you?

subtitles.original: あ、ゴー☆ジャス？ゴー☆ジャスはね、結局田舎の育ちなんだね、うん。
subtitles.english: Oh, Gorgeous? Gorgeous grew up in the countryside, you see.

subtitles.original: 目黒区じゃないんだ。
subtitles.english: Not in Meguro ward?

subtitles.original: 目黒区じゃないんだ。福島県いわき市、うん。
subtitles.english: Not Meguro ward. Iwaki City, Fukushima Prefecture.

subtitles.original: 全然、あのね、もう全然普通に、元々こういう派手なことしようと思ってない子供だったからね。
subtitles.english: I was just a completely normal child who didn't plan on doing flashy things like this.

subtitles.original: でと普通に虫捕まえてたね、小学校の頃とかはね。
subtitles.english: I used to catch bugs normally back in elementary school.

subtitles.original: きも！
subtitles.english: Gross!

subtitles.original: 嘘だろおい！虫きも！虫きもって。
subtitles.english: No way, hey! "Bugs are gross"? "Bugs are gross"?

subtitles.original: え、どんな虫？どんな虫？
subtitles.english: Ehh, what kind of bugs? What kind of bugs?

subtitles.original: トンボとか...セミとか...ね。みんなそうでしょ？今の公とか違うのかな？
subtitles.english: Dragonflies... cicadas... right. Everyone was like that, right? Maybe kids nowadays are different?

subtitles.original: あ、そう虫捕り少年はいるよね。少年やってた？
subtitles.english: Ah, yeah, there are bug-catching boys. Were you one?

subtitles.original: え、ころちゃん虫捕まえたことないの？
subtitles.english: Eh, Koro-chan, have you never caught a bug?

subtitles.original: いや、ころちゃんはね、小さい時はね、虫大丈夫だったん。セミも捕めたし、大丈夫だったんだけど。
subtitles.english: No, when I was little, I was fine with bugs. I could catch cicadas and all, I was fine.

subtitles.original: やっぱさ、大人になったらさ、虫きも、ってなったよね。
subtitles.english: But once I grew up, I started feeling like "bugs are gross."

subtitles.original: うん、虫きも！虫きも！とまずな、それはしょうがないね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, bugs are gross! Bugs are gross! Well, that can't be helped.

subtitles.original: え、そのさ目の星はさ、いつからできたの？
subtitles.english: Hey, that star on your eye, when did you get that?

subtitles.original: これは僕がね、あのね、田舎から上京するときにね、あのスーパーひたちっていう常磐線乗ってるときに、あの宇宙人に連れ去られちゃったの。
subtitles.english: When I was moving to Tokyo, while I was on the Super Hitachi express on the Joban Line, I was abducted by aliens.

subtitles.original: へ！
subtitles.english: Huh!

subtitles.original: でそれで、あの宇宙人のね、あの色々なあのあれを、施しを受けて、あの宇宙海賊として覚醒したわけよ。
subtitles.english: And after receiving various treatments from those aliens, I awakened as a Space Pirate.
